name: Fighting Style
description: Choose from one of six fighting styles: Archery,Defense, Dueling, Great Weapon Fighting, Protection, and Two-Weapo Fighting

name: Second Wind
description: Once per rest, you can use a bonus action to regain 1d10 + level of hit points

name: Action Surge
description: Once per rest, you can gain an extra action or bonus action on a turn

name: Spellcasting
description: Spellcasting gives access to a spellbook starting with 3 cantrips and 6 first level spells.

name: Arcane Recovery
description: Recover up to half your level (rounded up) spell slots each short rest

name: Arcane Tradition
description: Choose one of eight schools: Abjuration, Conjuration, Divination, Enchantment, Evocation, Illusion, Necromancy, or Transmutation
